description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. W.H. Clearwater - pool 1911 January 12. (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Text on poster in image: "Continuous pool contest between the leading experts Alfredo de Oro Champion and W.H. Clearwater challenger for championship of the world..." Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photo shows William H. Clearwater (1875-1948) of Ellwood, Pennsylvania who was a pocket billiards and continuous pool champion. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2009) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.13812 Call Number: LC-B2- 2784-6

note._content:
Continuous pool contest
between the leading experts
Alfredo de Oro
champion and
W. H. Clearwater
challenger for
championship of the world
emblem and purse
Brunswick-Balke-Collender Co. Table
Doyle's Billiard Academy
 New York
MON. TUES. & WED. EVE.
Jan. 16-17-18-1911
Admission $1.00
